languages.text: "Проктор Соломон Антар. Властью правителя Даргонуса и главы династии фон Валанциус я назначаю тебя новым маршалом Адептус Арбитес в Просторе Коронус! Проконтролируй, чтобы под твоим руководством Арбитес снова стали верными слугами Лекс Империалис".
languages.translation_comment:
Если не играет этюд VP_SolomonTraitorDead или VP_SolomonTraitorAlive
VC_SolomonTraitorExile

Если не играет этюд VP_SolomonTraitorDead или VP_SolomonTraitorAlive
VC_SolomonTraitorExile

languages.text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar, as ruler of Dargonus and head of the von Valancius dynasty, I name you the new Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites in the Koronus Expanse! See to it that the Arbites once more become faithful servants of the Lex Imperialis under your leadership."
languages.original_text: "Проктор Соломон Антар. Властью правителя Даргонуса и главы династии фон Валанциус я назначаю тебя новым маршалом Адептус Арбитес в Просторе Коронус! Проконтролируй, чтобы под твоим руководством Арбитес снова стали верными слугами Лекс Империалис".

traits.locale_text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar, as ruler of Dargonus and head of the von Valancius dynasty, I name you new Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites in the Koronus Expanse! See to it that the Arbites once more become faithful servants of the Lex Imperialis under your leadership."

"Proctor Solomorne Anthar, as ruler of Dargonus and head of the von Valancius dynasty, I name you new Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites in the Koronus Expanse! See to it that the Arbites once more become faithful servants of the Lex Imperialis under your leadership."

"Proctor Solomorne Anthar, as ruler of Dargonus and head of the von Valancius dynasty, I name you the new Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites in the Koronus Expanse! See to it that the Arbites once more become faithful servants of the Lex Imperialis under your leadership."

"Proctor Solomorne Anthar, as ruler of Dargonus and head of the von Valancius dynasty, I name you the new Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites in the Koronus Expanse! See to it that the Arbites once more become faithful servants of the Lex Imperialis under your leadership."

"Proctor Solomorne Anthar, as ruler of Dargonus and head of the von Valancius dynasty, I name you the new Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites in the Koronus Expanse! See to it that the Arbites once more become faithful servants of the Lex Imperialis under your leadership."

"Proctor Solomorne Anthar, as ruler of Dargonus and head of the von Valancius dynasty, I name you the new Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites in the Koronus Expanse! See to it that the Arbites once more become faithful servants of the Lex Imperialis under your leadership."

languages.text: "Proktor Solomorne Anthar, als {mf|Herrscher|Herrscherin} von Dargonus und Oberhaupt der Dynastie derer von Valancius ernenne ich Euch zum neuen Marschall des Adeptus Arbites in der Koronus-Ausdehnung! Sorgt dafür, dass sich die Arbites unter Eurem Kommando einmal mehr als treue Diener des Lex Imperia erweisen."
languages.original_text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar, as ruler of Dargonus and head of the von Valancius dynasty, I name you the new Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites in the Koronus Expanse! See to it that the Arbites once more become faithful servants of the Lex Imperialis under your leadership."

traits.locale_text: "Proktor Solomorne Anthar, als {mf|Herrscher|Herrscherin} von Dargonus und Oberhaupt der Dynastie derer von Valancius ernenne ich Euch zum neuen Marschall des Adeptus Arbites in der Koronus-Ausdehnung! Sorgt dafür, dass sich die Arbites unter Eurem Kommando einmal mehr als treue Diener des Lex Imperia erweisen."

languages.text: « Proctor Solomorne Anthar, en tant que {mf|dirigeant|dirigeante} de Dargonus et de la dynastie von Valancius, je fais de vous le nouveau maréchal de l'Adeptus Arbites dans les Étendues de Koronus ! Veillez à ce que les membres de l'Arbites redeviennent les fidèles serviteurs de la Lex Imperialis. »
languages.original_text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar, as ruler of Dargonus and head of the von Valancius dynasty, I name you the new Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites in the Koronus Expanse! See to it that the Arbites once more become faithful servants of the Lex Imperialis under your leadership."

traits.locale_text: « Proctor Solomorne Anthar, en tant que {mf|dirigeant|dirigeante} de Dargonus et de la dynastie von Valancius, je fais de vous le nouveau maréchal de l'Adeptus Arbites dans les Étendues de Koronus ! Veillez à ce que les membres de l'Arbites redeviennent les fidèles serviteurs de la Lex Imperialis. »

languages.text: “索罗蒙·安萨监察官，身为达戈努斯的统治者、冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的首领，我在此任命你为科罗努斯扩区法务部的新任元帅！你要确保在你的领导下，法务部会再次成为帝国律法的忠仆。”
languages.original_text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar, as ruler of Dargonus and head of the von Valancius dynasty, I name you the new Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites in the Koronus Expanse! See to it that the Arbites once more become faithful servants of the Lex Imperialis under your leadership."

traits.locale_text: “索罗蒙·安萨监察官，身为达戈努斯的统治者、冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的首领，我在此任命你为科罗努斯扩区法务部的新任元帅！你要确保在你的领导下，法务部会再次成为帝国律法的忠仆。”

languages.text: «Procurador Solomorne Anthar, como gobernante de Dargonus y líder de la dinastía von Valancius, ¡le nombro nuevo Mariscal del Adeptus Arbites y la Extensión de Koronus! Ocúpese de que el Arbites vuelve a servir fielmente a la Lex Imperialis bajo su mandato».
languages.original_text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar, as ruler of Dargonus and head of the von Valancius dynasty, I name you the new Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites in the Koronus Expanse! See to it that the Arbites once more become faithful servants of the Lex Imperialis under your leadership."

traits.locale_text: «Procurador Solomorne Anthar, como gobernante de Dargonus y líder de la dinastía von Valancius, ¡le nombro nuevo Mariscal del Adeptus Arbites y la Extensión de Koronus! Ocúpese de que el Arbites vuelve a servir fielmente a la Lex Imperialis bajo su mandato».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}はダルゴナスの統治者として、またフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の当主として、ソロモーン・アンサール代理人をコロヌス・エクスパンスの高等裁定局の新しい将帥に任命する！君の指導の下、裁定局が再びレックス・インペリアの忠実な下僕となるよう見届けてくれ」
languages.original_text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar, as ruler of Dargonus and head of the von Valancius dynasty, I name you the new Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites in the Koronus Expanse! See to it that the Arbites once more become faithful servants of the Lex Imperialis under your leadership."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}はダルゴナスの統治者として、またフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の当主として、ソロモーン・アンサール代理人をコロヌス・エクスパンスの高等裁定局の新しい将帥に任命する！君の指導の下、裁定局が再びレックス・インペリアの忠実な下僕となるよう見届けてくれ」

languages.text: "Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar, Dargonus'un hükümdarı ve von Valancius hanedanlığının başı olarak seni Adeptus Arbites'in Koronus Enginliği'ndeki yeni Miralay'ı ilan ediyorum! Önderliğinde Arbites, yeniden Lex İmperialis'e sadık bir şekilde hizmet edecek."
languages.original_text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar, as ruler of Dargonus and head of the von Valancius dynasty, I name you the new Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites in the Koronus Expanse! See to it that the Arbites once more become faithful servants of the Lex Imperialis under your leadership."

traits.locale_text: "Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar, Dargonus'un hükümdarı ve von Valancius hanedanlığının başı olarak seni Koronus Enginliği'ndeki Adeptus Arbites'in yeni Miralay'ı ilan ediyorum! Senin önderliğinde Arbites, yeniden Lex Imperialis'in sadık hizmetkârları olacak."
